event.title: extracted copper from this area for more than a thousand years

data.event: The Atacame√±os extracted copper from this area for more than a thousand years.
Nevertheless, it was American explorations in the 1950s that revealed the presence of ore that could be exploited in an industrial scale.

event.title: search of a new Chilean ore body in 1951

data.event: Anaconda Copper Mining Company was concerned about declining reserves in its Potrerillos mine and it sent prospectors in search of a new Chilean ore body in 1951.
Working under the auspices Anaconda's Andes Mining subsidiary, the mineralization was discovered in 1954 and mapped in 1955.
